author: Aaron Burkett
text:
Our County is currently looking for creative options to support installations of roadway lighting on local thouroughfares and residential streets.
What programs and revenue sources have other municipalities explored to support installations of lighting as well as long term maintenance and power costs?
What challenges have other municipalities experienced in trying to support lighting installations on a broad scale?
What challenges have other municipalities experienced in maintaining large inventories of roadway lighting?
In general what successes have been realized in pursuing installations of roadway lighting on a broad scale?
title: Roadway Lighting Programs
